meanings.sent1: The beautiful artwork was so museful.
meanings.sent2: The sunset over the ocean was truly museful.
meanings.sent3: The quirky painting was surprisingly museful.
meanings.sent4: Her words were a museful melody to his ears.
meanings.sent5: The majestic mountains stood as a museful backdrop.

meanings.definition: Capable of inspiring thought or reflection.
meanings.sent1: The thought-provoking book was incredibly museful.
meanings.sent2: The deep conversation was quite museful.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected twist in the story was oddly museful.
meanings.sent4: His eyes held a museful depth that captivated her.
meanings.sent5: The starry night sky was a museful sight to behold.
